Title: Childhood
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The school outing visits the Rent Collection Courtyard, a famous Cultural Revolution sculptural assemblage depicting the old society.More on this group of spectacular statues and its origin can be found in Denise Y. Ho & Jie Li, "From Landlord Manor to Red Memorabilia: Reincarnations of a Chinese Museum Town", Modern China (2015), 1-35.
